## ⬇️ How to Download & Run

1. Click **fiction-novel-generator.zip** below to download
2. Extract the ZIP anywhere on your PC (e.g. `Documents\fiction-novel-generator`)
3. Double-click **`setup_and_run.bat`** inside the folder
   - It checks Python, installs dependencies, and launches the app automatically
   - The API key prompt is **optional** — just press Enter to skip it
4. The app window opens ✅

---

**API key is optional.**
Without a key the app generates complete novels using built-in genre knowledge.
For richer, research-backed novels get a free key at https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

---

**Requirements:** Windows · Python 3.9+ · [Download Python here](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
